channel.title: Hello on John Cosio
channel.description: Recent content in Hello on John Cosio

item.title: Hello world!
item.description: Hello! This is my first post. I used to have another blog and use this as my landing page but it is now inactive. I’ll be trying to use this from now on. I haven’t really thought about what to write here. I just want to be able search myself correctly from Google results. Maybe next time I’ll land on the number one spot. By the way I really like black backgrounds with shiny life stream like images from FF7.
